item.title: About
item.description: About Me Ph.D candidate at Aerospace Information Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Research Interest Intelligent understanding of remote sensing images. Data assimilation. Publications In chronological order: C. Shi, Z. Zhang, W. Zhang, C. Zhang and Q. Xu, “Learning Multiscale Temporal-Spatial-Spectral Features via a Multi-path Convolutional LSTM Neural Network for Change Detection with Hyperspectral Images,” in IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, doi: 10.
